replies.body:
Hello Deus ex Delirium ! :)

I'm from Feral Gaming and I just read that you are looking for some teammates? Well, maybe we can help there. We have about 150 active members in our community. Many people are looking for a ranked team as well - 3v3 and 5v5 ! Maybe you find someone here? 

Maybe just take a look and come over - TS iP : 212.227.136.32 - or add me ingame ! :)

Good luck and have fun in the Twisted Treeline ! :) 

Bonnie23 (FeG)
